sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import AppointmentCancel from './AppointmentCancel'; function AppointmentDetail({ isOpen, onClose, onEdit, onRecord, detail }) { const [appointmentDetails, setAppointmentDetails] = useState(detail) const [cancelOpen, setCancelOpen] = useState(false) if (!isOpen) return null return (

Title:

Counsellor:

Date:

Time:

{appointmentDetails.title}

{appointmentDetails.counsellor}

{appointmentDetails.date}

{appointmentDetails.time}

{setCancelOpen(false); onClose}}/>
) } export default AppointmentDetail
